documents.document: Weary from the state of the world. An evening of Netflix and distraction is required.
It's good to be back #RoomtoImprove
2 Sinks?! AND a heated towel rail?! This isn't 2007 lads. #RoomtoImprove
The house looks stunning. Bravo @DermotBannon #RoomtoImprove
So why make it look like a Military Base? #RoomtoImprove
I hope Dermot gets some free car insurance for the distress that was caused. #RoomtoImprove
Poor Dermot is walking around that kitchen like a child who misplaced their favourite stuffed animal. #RoomtoImprove
Dermot - 'I wear the orange jacket so shut up and do as I say' #RoomtoImprove
That's one of the best creeping windows I've ever seen. #RoomtoImprove
TBH I think she should just be satisfied she can see out of the window at this stage. #RoomtoImprove
They didn't use Munster Joinery?! Betrayal. #RoomtoImprove
Pfffft. Certification. Who needs that. Certs are for losers. #RoomtoImprove
In fairness those beams look like they wouldn't hold up Robbie's notions never mind his house. #RoomtoImprove
We may be living with this kitchen forever but we will bow to the will of the almighty Dermot and choose the one we despise #RoomToImprove
Robbie - 'If I was to buy a car' *turns to camera* 'Which I would insure with AIG insurance' #RoomToImprove
Yes. You know the yellow bowl we all keep on the counter for absolutely no fucking reason. #RoomToImprove
Dermot - 'We're all in a much worse position' Translation - 'We're fucked' #RoomtoImprove
We're taking inspiration from shower gel now are we? Jaysus, easily know they don't use a bar of Dettol Soap in that house. #RoomtoImprove
I'm beginning to wonder in Mr. Builder facilitated Robbie's accident #RoomtoImprove
I love how in order to get the utmost sympathy from the country they needed to show Robbie's struggles with making tea. #RoomtoImprove
Hear that Ex-Boyfriend?! You too could have spent almost half a million on an absolute dump. #TheOneThatGotAway #RoomtoImprove
'Dermot Bannon and the Lost Sewerage Drain' Wow these Harry Potter remakes are getting worse and worse. #RoomtoImprove
You done messed up Robbie. You done messed up. #RoomtoImprove
Even Patricia wouldn't have been able to sign off on this shit show. #RoomtoImprove
THAT'S HIS SON?! Did he have him when he was 4 years old?! #RoomtoImprove
By smashing that window Robbie managed to unleash some of his daily window cleaning frustrations #RoomtoImprove
Christ. I need to get into window cleaning. #RoomtoImprove
What?! We require money in order to exchange it for goods and services?! #RoomtoImprove
Oi buddy. You're the one with no money. Don't you dare take this out on our beloved Dermot. #RoomtoImprove
Maybe he could donate his beard in order to raise money? #RoomtoImprove
The back of the house will be rebuilt with cardboard held up with hope and sticky tape because that's all you can afford. #RoomtoImprove
Lisa wearing a high-vis jacket in the middle of a well lit cafe. Hmmmm #roomtoimprove
QS Patricia has fled with her remaining nerve in tact for a life of polished concrete related therapy #roomtoimprove
They said â‚¬180k and Dermot heard â‚¬500k #roomtoimprove
Hipster Beard is optimistic. Or at least that's what he tells himself as he cries himself to sleep. #roomtoimprove
Spending 400k without being inside the house?! Celtic tiger is alive and well. #roomtoimprove
Jesus fucking Christ. https://t.co/inyS4pOvAP
While the world is gone to shit can we all appreciate the ray of sunshine that is Dermot Bannon re-entering our lives later? #RoomtoImprove
@OGrianain22 Very. You'd love him. #Puntastic
Noooooooo. Poor Pun Guy. I'd have definitely shifted him for the flour joke alone. #FirstDatesIRL
Gotta love migrane so bad you can't stop throwing up. It's awesome. #alternativefact
Just about sums it up. #fuckingwall
@realDonaldTrump isn't the President of America. If I chose to believe it it has to be true. Right @KellyannePolls? #alternativefacts
When they go low we go high. Just need to hang onto that. #TrumpInauguration #Inauguration
I can't wait for this rich white man to decide what's best for the average person. #TrumpInauguration
I'm watching the western world crumble in front of my eyes, but I made a good cup of tea so it's not all bad. #Inauguration
@kteluvsmusic You will never quash my love!!
Waiting on my results like: #accaresults https://t.co/mCoe9KjQ15
Glad I watched it with @niamhhew though. Having a Doctor on hand for the post credits cardiac arrest was handy. #Sherlock
SON OF A MOTHERFUCKING FUCK. #Sherlock
I mean at the start I was like 'what?'. Then there were feels. Then there was stunned silence. #Sherlock
@spabreaks Need a refund as I've been charged twice for a December stay. Noone seems to be answering the phone. Very frustrating.
Couldn't be worse #2017in3words
Let's play a game of let's figure out what the fuck is going on when being forced to watch Fair City.
After that B-Batteries joke @bdunkelman never needs to think she's not funny. The reason that was spat on my laptop can confirm. #RTPodcast
It's post watershed. We can say ass in front of children right? #LateLateToyShow
THE PARADE. Let the chaos commence. #LateLateToyShow
This kid is me looking at pizza. #LateLateToyShow https://t.co/9UMC2d5ftu
VR on the Toyshow. We've come a long way from Uncle Gaybo in the 90s. #LateLateShow
Timmy doesn't speak peasant #LateLateToyShow
Instant Cameras. Teach them your hipster ways from a young age. #LateLateToyShow
@paulpmcg I speak with love. I'm one meself shur. :P
Someone tell the Culchies it's not the 8th of December yet. They've no reason to be in the Big Schmoke #LateLateToyShow
This child doesn't seem like he was overly attached to his sheep. Should have worked a bit harder on her keepy uppys. #LateLateToyShow
'Sheep can't play football' - Late Late Show 2016 #LateLateToyShow
Bull McCabe has arrived. #LateLateToyShow
Hon youngfella' #SomePairOfLungs #LateLateToyShow
Though Irish children today need to broaden their horizons and choose heros other than the contents of the RTE Canteen. #LateLateToyShow
Ryan and Dermot in the same place. Be still my beating heart. #LateLateToyShow
DERMOT BANNON ON THE TOY SHOW. THIS IS NOT A DRILL. #ToyShow #LateLateToyShow
@ThreeCare Thanks so much for the great service. â¤
@ThreeCare Everytime the Internet stops working I restart and it works for maybe an hour. Sometimes can happen 6+ times per day. Working now
@ThreeCare Internet coverage had been appalling. Had issues everyday for the last week and a bit. Just me or general problem?
Finally. Thanks for the assistance twitter! #HiddenBooksGame https://t.co/cafvcr7lSI
Wait.....this means @IAmLindsayJones and @AH_Michael had sex. Gross. #LiterallyForTheKid #RTExtraLife
I cried a little bit. #CongratulationsMichaelAndLindsay https://t.co/1RgK60WhLK
The tradition continues. #RTExtraLife posters purchased. Amazing work and amazing stream as always!
This is why we need a change. This is what we need to prevent. #repealthe8th https://t.co/0HuTEjsJyA
@aaroadwatch Bus broken down on Patrick's St in Cork. Causing some issues.
@Masshalogear Thanks!! ðŸ’•ðŸ’• https://t.co/XKq9JYRFme
@Masshalogear My Life. https://t.co/ClqxcHy3wQ
Just tried to do a simple multiplication without my calculator. I learned 2 things. 1. 4x5 is not 35 and 2. Accountancy may not be for me.
@Aldi_Ireland What's gone down in Bishopstown? #UnintentionalRhyming
As much as it galls me to say it that was an excellent penalty. #DUBvMAYO
Listening to Nick Pisa discuss with glee the murder of Maradeth Kercher is a sobering reminder of how fucked society is. #AmandaKnox
I'm come to the realisation that adulthood is a continuous cycle of buying whatever shower gel is on offer until you reach death. #adulting
And just like that the Google searches for 'Dampfnudel' skyrocketed. #GBBO
@niamhhew How dare Austerity Spice laugh at Mary. >:(
@barenakedladies Why you no play Ireland? #ShutUpAndTakeMyMoney
Just turned off new Top Gear in order to watch the old Top Gear Bolivia special for the 10th time. #SaysItAll #TopGear
I'll settle for paying .005% in tax. I mean it's only fair. #AppleTax
Sooooo....do I get to buy a yacht or.......#AppleTax
GREAT BRITISH BAKE OFF IS LESS THAN 24 HOURS AWAY. THIS IS NOT A DRILL. #GBBO
I suppose none of you have said anything bad. @slackalicebeer said something silly & apologised. In the immortal words of Elsa, Let it go.
@The_Necromancer ... what I decide to do with my body I will end this conversation here. I sincerely hope you have a plesant evening.
@The_Necromancer @TwoWomenTravel I agree, twitter is not the place for a debate, & as I will never agree that you should have a say on ...
@The_Necromancer @TwoWomenTravel No. It's not. 140 characters isn't enough to diagnose a mental illness.
@The_Necromancer 1. Abortion affects women far more than men. 2. My issue was your labelling of these women having no idea of their story.
@The_Necromancer @TwoWomenTravel Also wish to state, I respect your point of view. Labelling people you've never met sociopaths is my issue
